summary: Two stealth geared follwers based on the Matera custom race by Charismoon.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a basic companion mod based on Charismoon\'s Matera race. 
I liked the race quite a bit and decided to make this. They seem to work 
well enough so far, but if anyone encounters anything strange feel free 
to post about it.

Both Synbios and Fiona are geared towards stealth/thievery/assassin gameplay, since that is what I prefer. That basically means light armor, dual wielding, sneak perks, and ranged combat. They will also heal themselves.

Fiona is more suited for ranged combat, while Synbios will be better at dual-wielding melee combat.

They can both be found at \"The Drunken Huntsman\" in Whiterun.

If you like this mod, please endorse it!
Also endorse Charismoon\'s page as well!

Requiments:
Matera Race by Charismoon: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23170
ApachiiSkyHair* by Apachii: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Flans Eyes for Skyrim by DarNilavu: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14539

*Synbios requies both ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_4_Full as well as ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_0
Fiona only requies ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_4_Full

Recommend:
RANs HeadMesh Variant (Type-B) by RAN46: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127

The tattoo on Fiona in the screenshots is from: 
\"Tattoo female by Barricata -with CBBE texture nude-\" by Barricata.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4182
author: SynX1
